sect2.title: Installation of daemontools
sect2.para: Install daemontools by running the following commands:

screen.userinput: cd admin/daemontools-0.76 && package/compile && cd package && sed 's|command|usr/sbin|' boot.inittab > boot.inittab~ && mv boot.inittab~ boot.inittab && cd ../command && sed 's|/command:/usr/local/bin:/usr/local/sbin:||' svscanboot > svscanboot~ && sed 's|/service|/etc/service|g' svscanboot~ > svscanboot && rm svscanboot~ && cp * /usr/sbin && cd ../package && cat /etc/inittab boot.inittab > /etc/inittab~ && mv -f /etc/inittab~ /etc/inittab && telinit Q && mkdir /etc/service
